OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA.synopsis: Post EA version of FOR_Village_OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_PostEAAfter finding Sharan crown on a skeleton, an old journal speaking of local disappearances or a defiled statue of Selune, Shadowheart recognises that the ruined village of Moonhaven was attacked by Shar worshippers at some point and realises she may have allies nearby. While she's contemplating this, she experiences a flicker of strange magic. If present, her companions may notice this and ask what's the matter - she can be truthful or not, knowing that leading the party to a Shar stronghold could end in the deaths of some companions.
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA.how_to_trigger: While in the Abandoned Village and controlling a Shadowheart avatar, pick up the broken Shar crown, the priestess' journal, or approach the vandalised Selune statue

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA.synopsis: POST EA DIALOG OF FOR_Village_OM_ShadowHeart_COMAfter finding Sharran crown on a skeleton, an old journal speaking of local disappearances or a defiled statue of Selune, Shadowheart recognises that the ruined village of Moonhaven was attacked by Shar worshippers at some point and realises she may have allies nearby. While she's contemplating this, she experiences a flicker of strange magic. Her companions may notice this and ask what's the matter - she can be truthful or not, knowing that leading the party to a Shar stronghold could end in the deaths of some companions.
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA.how_to_trigger: While in the Abandoned Village and controlling your player Avatar, pick up the broken Shar crown, the priestess' journal, or approach the vandalised Selune statue while Shadowheart is in your party and nearby

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_13.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_13.text: *Your breath catches. The remains of the Selûne statue are defaced with Sharran markings.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_31.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_31.text: *They must have raided this place, long ago.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_5.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_5.text: *The wound on your hand threatens to flare again.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_21.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_21.text: Try to recall why this is happening.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_23.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_23.text: *It's no use - your willpower crumbles and the pain washes over you.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_36.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_36.text: *Again, half-familiar images assail you. Forgotten memories, or waking dreams, you cannot say.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_14.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_14.text: *Lady Shar's symbol. Her face etched in stone. Robed figures, with faces you know you should know. All of it linked by the pain. All of it linked to Lady Shar.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_18.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_18.text: *The pain ebbs away. But you sense it will be back. Is it a punishment? A test? Only the Dark Lady knows.*
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's posture relaxes as the pain passes.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_15.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_15.text: *...you pause. A sharp tingling sensation is spreading from your fingertips.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheard grimaces in pain as a glow ignites under the skin of her right hand.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_26.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_26.text: *The pain blurs your vision and ushers forth strange, half-familiar images.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_37.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_37.text: *You, kneeling upon cold flagstones, in prayer. Your tongue trips over the holy words of Lady Shar and the pain flares.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_6.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_6.text: *Your hand, shying away from interrogating a captive enemy. The pain bites in punishment.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_33.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_33.text: *You hiding from duties in a little alcove you call your own. But the pain finds you anyway.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_10.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_10.text: *Finally, the sensation fades, and takes the images with it. You stare at your hand - unblemished, as if nothing had happened.*
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's posture relaxes as the pain passes.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheard grimaces in pain as a glow ignites under the skin of her right hand.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_27.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_PostEA_27.text: *Your breath catches. The events in the journal sound like the work of Shar worshippers.*

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_25.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_25.text: *Shadowheart's attention is fixed upon the contents of an old journal.*

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheard grimaces in pain as a glow ignites under the skin of her right hand.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_6.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_6.text: Another episode? Why does this keep happening to you?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_28.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_28.text: You already know as much as I do. Best ignore it, as long as it doesn't hamper us too much.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_3.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_3.text: This pain of yours - I hope it won't become a hindrance for us.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_26.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_26.text: Why does that keep happening to you?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_21.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_21.text: Perhaps Lady Shar is testing me somehow... perhaps not. I don't know, in short.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_0.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_0.text: Nothing to be done about it now, anyway.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_36.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_36.text: Your guess is as good as mine.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_15.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_15.text: I... I don't know exactly. Lady Shar protect me.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_12.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_12.text: You must know something. Has this happened before?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_5.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_5.text: It felt... oddly familiar. But I don't know why.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_11.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_11.text: It's stopped now, whatever it is. Let's just carry on.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_29.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_29.text: We both know that's not true. Something stirred up magic within you. What was it?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_30.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_30.text: I saw something that reminded me of my faith... my mission. I felt something rise within me, like my blood was on fire. Then it passed. That's all I know.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_17.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_17.text: I know magic when I see it. This may warrant investigating.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_32.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_32.text: Maybe... it felt oddly familiar, but I don't know why...

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_22.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_22.text: Nothing. A trick of the light.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_24.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_24.text: Trick of the light? Don't take me for a fool.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_33.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_33.text: If I knew, I promise I'd tell you. But I don't. Can we just leave it at that for now, please?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_10.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_10.text: I don't know - what more can I say?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_23.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_23.text: I'll take you as I find you. Now let the matter rest.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_38.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_38.text: Let's just move along. Time's a rare currency for both of us.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_35.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_35.text: We both know that's not true. Something stirred up magic within you. What was it?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_2.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_2.text: I saw something that reminded me of... well, it's private. But then I felt something rise within me, like my blood was on fire. Then it passed. That's all I know.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_8.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_8.text: Are you sure? Looked like magic to me.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_27.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_PostEA_27.text: *Shadowheart's attention is fixed on a damaged old statue.*
